Text: EDI Training Cc Every Friday in October and November Jim Studebaker andor I will facilitate an EDI discussion for customer service reps working the weekend Please attend this EDI training on Friday October from in EBC The discussion will include a review of the TMS quick response and diagnostic tool screens and the Team EDI web page Questions related to EDI and problem resolution will also be discussed If you have already attended you do not need to attend again However if you have any EDI questions please feel free to attend again We look forward to seeing you at the meeting Jim and Mary

EDI Training Cc Every Friday in October and November Jim Studebaker and I will facilitate an EDI discussion for customer service reps working the weekend Please attend this EDI training on Friday October from in EB The discussion will include a review of the TMS quick response and diagnostic tool screens and the Team EDI web page Questions related to EDI and problem resolution will also be discussed Beverly please provide me a telephone number where you can be reached We look forward to seeing you at the meeting Jim and Mary

Confirmations Transwestern with El PasoEveryone With lots of great help from Bert and Beverly a timeline of the Transwestern confirmation process with El Paso has been documented and is attached Also at the bottom of this attachment are several issues that have been identified in looking at the EDI process I will be getting a meeting together either Friday or early next week to discuss Thanks Mary

EDI Confirmations Between Transwestern and El PasoEveryone Attached is a proposed EDI confirmation process and timeline for Transwestern EDI confirmations with El Paso Please review and let me know if there are any changes that need to be made to this document I have also included sections with changes to the current process and proposed system enhancements Mary
Northern TPAsShelley Will you be able to continue executing the Northern Natural Gas Company TPAs If not can you tell me who will so that I can update the TPA on the website Thanks Mary
